Alright SayMyName this one is for you!

Step by Step:

1. Unzip the .zip file using winrar
2. Install the program by double clicking the setup
3. Once installed go into the AnMing file under Program files
4. Replace the  player.dll  file with the one in the crack folder. 
5. Enjoy!
